<a id="IntervalTweener"></a>

# IntervalTweener

**Inherits:** [Tweener](Tweener.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Creates an idle interval in a [Tween](Tween.md) animation.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**IntervalTweener** is used to make delays in a tweening sequence. See [Tween.tween_interval()](Tween.md#Tween_method_tween_interval) for more usage information.

\ **Note:** [Tween.tween_interval()](Tween.md#Tween_method_tween_interval) is the only correct way to create **IntervalTweener**. Any **IntervalTweener** created manually will not function correctly.
